content: The aim of this section is to find little alcoves or wider sections of the path, so you can dip into them and stay out of the ball's line of fire.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The aim of this section is to find little alcoves or wider sections of the path, so you can dip into them and stay out of the ball's line of fire.
